body:
If I have two packages `a` and `b` with `a` being:
```python
class A(BundlePackage):
    """package A"""

    version('1')
    depends_on('hwloc')
```
and `b` being:
```python
class B(BundlePackage):
    """Package B"""
    version('1')
    depends_on('a')
    variant("hwloc", default=True, description="enable hwloc")
    depends_on('hwloc@1.11.8', when= "+hwloc")
```
I am getting the following concretization error:
```
spack spec b
Input spec
--------------------------------
b

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    hwloc@2.0.2%gcc@4.8.5~cairo~cuda~gl+libxml2~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^libpciaccess
            ^libtool
                ^m4@1.4.6:
            ^pkgconf@1.6.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^util-macros
        ^libxml2
            ^libiconv
            ^xz
            ^zlib


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    b@1%gcc@4.8.5+hwloc arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^a@1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^hwloc@2.0.2%gcc@4.8.5~cairo~cuda~gl+libxml2~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^libpciaccess
                    ^libtool
                        ^m4@1.4.6:
                    ^pkgconf@1.6.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^util-macros
                ^libxml2
                    ^libiconv
                    ^xz
                    ^zlib


b requires hwloc version 1.11.8, but spec asked for 2.0.2
```
However if I drop the variant in `b`:
```python
class B(BundlePackage):
    """package B"""
    version('1')
    depends_on('a')
    depends_on('hwloc@1.11.8')
```
concretization works:
```
pack spec b
Input spec
--------------------------------
b

Concretized
--------------------------------
b@1%gcc@4.8.5+hwloc arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
    ^a@1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
        ^hwloc@1.11.8%gcc@4.8.5~cairo~cuda~gl+libxml2~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^libpciaccess@0.13.5%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@4.8.5 patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^libsigsegv@2.11%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^pkgconf@1.6.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^libxml2@2.9.9%gcc@4.8.5~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^libiconv@1.15%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^numactl@2.0.12%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^perl@5.26.2%gcc@4.8.5+cpanm patches=0eac10ed90aeb0459ad8851f88081d439a4e41978e586ec743069e8b059370ac +shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                            ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                                ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@4.8.5~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^automake@1.16.1%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```
title: Concretizer issue using variants
